mapper.select:
select top 100 PO_Pomain.POID,PO_Pomain.cPOID, convert(varchar(50),PO_Pomain.dPoDate,23) as dPoDate, PO_Pomain.cMemo,Vendor.cVenCode,Vendor.cVenName from PO_Pomain left join Vendor on PO_Pomain.cVenCode=Vendor.cVenCode left join PO_Podetails on PO_Pomain.POID=PO_Podetails.POID
and PO_Podetails.iQuantity>PO_Podetails.iReceivedQTY
and PO_Pomain.POID < #{endId}
and PO_Pomain.cCloser is null
order by PO_Pomain.POID desc
